title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 483 - Hazardous Waste Program Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 483 - Hazardous Waste Program Fees

State Regulations
§ 483.1 - Who must pay and how much
§ 483.2 - What the department reviews to determine the hazardous waste program fee
§ 483.3 - Redetermination of hazardous waste program fees
§ 483.4 - Fees related to cleanup, remediation, or corrective action
§ 483.5 - Fee liability for delisted waste

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 483

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 72-0201

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
